::KitKat::

She looked at Megatron. "I do not think it would be wise to attack 
until the base has come to rest.  Attacking a moving ship may prove 
more of a problem than when it is at rest. Now, Megatron." She turned 
and looked at the clone. The clone walked out of the shadows and 
walked towards Megatron.  The clone stopped and stood infront of 
Megatron. "Megatron, please say Hello to Megatron."  The clone bowed 
and looked at the original.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Aracnia, sitting in the conference room contacted 
Quickstrike. "All right 
> Commander, come to Destructors base with PAralysis and the rat. 
Remember to 
> leave the shields up and the autoguns armed. Theres no point in not 
having 
> them armed." She then turned to Kitkat.
>     
>     Megatron inhaled deeply as he entered. There was something 
about this 
> room....mabey something IN this room that gave him an uneasy 
feeling. He felt 
> himself shiver. "Kitkat, can we get on with it please? The longer 
we take 
> here.....the more of a chance Zardus has to prepare himself."
